title.value: Mindfulness meditation styles differently modulate source-level MEG microstate dynamics and complexity
title.justification: The title is provided at the beginning of the document, serving as a clear identification of the paper's topic on mindfulness meditation and MEG microstate dynamics.
title.quote: Mindfulness meditation styles differently modulate source-level MEG microstate dynamics and complexity

extractions.description: The paper investigates how different mindfulness meditation styles, such as focused attention meditation (FAM) and open monitoring meditation (OMM), affect MEG microstate dynamics and complexity. The study uses a source-level approach to analyze microstates and brain criticality during these meditation practices, exploring the dynamic transitions and complexity of brain activity in experienced Theravada Buddhist monks.

type.justification: The paper presents experimental data and analysis from MEG recordings taken from Buddhist monks practicing different meditation styles, making it an empirical study.
type.quote: In this study, we aimed at exploring MEG microstates at source-level during FAM, OMM and in the resting state, as well as the complexity and criticality of dynamic transitions between microstates.

name.justification: The study involves the investigation of brain activities and neural correlates of meditation, a core focus of neuroscience.
name.quote: The study of neurophysiological and neurobiological bases underpinning meditation practice is gaining momentum due to the relevance of meditation-based interventions...

name.justification: MEG is the main neuroimaging technique utilized in the paper to explore brain microstates during meditation.
name.quote: The high temporal resolution of magnetoencephalography (MEG) has been exploited to fill the gap between the personal experience of meditation practice and its neural correlates.

name.justification: The paper specifically studies the effects of different mindfulness meditation techniques on MEG microstate dynamics.
